mapper.select: SELECT PJT_CD, PJT_NM, CUST_NM, UP_SU, DOWN_SU, AREA_P, YAREA_P FROM T_PS3000 WHERE BUSI_YY LIKE #{BUSI_YY} AND UP_SU BETWEEN #{UP_SU} AND #{UP_SU2} AND YAREA_P BETWEEN #{YAREA_P} AND #{YAREA_P2}
SELECT PJT_CD, PJT_NM FROM T_PS3000 WHERE BUSI_YY LIKE #{BUSI_YY} AND PJT_NM LIKE '%'+ #{PJT_NM} +'%' AND DEPT_CD LIKE '%'+ #{DEPT_CD} +'%'
